docs.snippet: The University of Notre Dame's iconic football stadium will be flanked by three massive buildings under a $400 million project that will also create nearly 4,000 premium seats at the "House that Rockne Built."...

docs.snippet: The former Wildcats quarterback Kain Colter joined executives of the newly formed College Athletes Players Association and the United Steel Workers in order to be granted “a seat at the table.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: The former Wildcats quarterback Kain Colter joined executives of the newly formed College Athletes Players Association and the United Steel Workers in order to be granted “a seat at the table.”
docs.abstract: Group of football players from Northwestern University appeal to the National Labor Relations Board with the first effort by college athletes to join a labor union; labor law dispute could turn on whether college athletes are students, employees or some hybrid.

headline.main: In a First, Northwestern Players Seek Unionization
headline.print_headline: In a First, Northwestern Players Seek Unionization
